name: aio-dev-invoke
description: Invoke a runtime action that is running locally via aio app dev. Can discover available actions and call them with parameters.

actionName.description: Name of the action to invoke (e.g., "starter-kit/info"). Required unless discoverActions is true.

parameters.description: JSON object of parameters to pass to the action (optional)

method.description: HTTP method to use (GET, POST, PUT, etc.). Default: POST

port.description: Port number where the dev server is running (optional, default: 9080)

discoverActions.description: Discover available actions by testing common action names (optional, default: false)
